+++ b/cmake/sdf_config.cmake.in Fri Oct 10 15:42:08 2014 -0700
@@ -3,6 +3,8 @@
 endif()
 set(@PKG_NAME@_CONFIG_INCLUDED TRUE)

+include (FindPkgConfig)
